Page.title: About Me
Page._content:
## About Me

My name is Huang Cheng (Allen). I have 10 years of experience in technical support and FAE team management, focusing on the intelligent hardware/IoT field.

### Contact Information

- **WeChat/Mobile**: 13760211420
- **Email**: 396164358@qq.com
- **Birthday**: December 1992
- **Location**: Shenzhen

### Job Intention

FAE Manager, Technical Support, Solution Engineer, Technical Sales, TPM, Project Manager

---

Page.title: 关于我
Page._content:
## 关于我

我叫黄成（Allen Huang），拥有10年技术支持和FAE团队管理经验，专注智能硬件/IoT领域，擅长从客户需求到产品落地的全流程技术赋能。

### 联系方式

- **微信/手机**: 13760211420
- **邮箱**: 396164358@qq.com
- **生日**: 1992.12
- **所在地**: 深圳

### 求职意向

FAE经理、技术支持、解决方案工程师、技术销售、TPM、项目经理

---

Post.title: 工作经历
Post._content:
## 工作经历

### 昆山丘钛智行致远科技有限公司
**项目经理** | 昆山/深圳 | 2025.02 - 现在

关键词：良率、交付计划、PM、Meta、Google、微距显示、微型摄像头

- 担任项目经理，负责组建跨职能项目团队
- 作为Meta客户主要对接人，主导公司首个海外大规模量产项目
- 对接谷歌下一代XR设备摄像头模组试产项目

---

### 深圳市卓驭科技有限公司（大疆车载）
**FAE负责人（T4）** | 广东深圳 | 2022.05 - 2025.02

关键词：ADAS、CANoe、QNX、系统工程师

- 担任大疆车载研发FAE负责人，管理40余人团队
- 深度参与多个SOP项目，对接五菱、大众、比亚迪、奇瑞等主机厂

---

### 深圳市商汤科技有限公司（SCG）
**技术支持** | 广东深圳 | 2020.12 - 2022.05

关键词：人脸识别、docker、Restful API

- 负责商汤人脸识别产品海外客户技术支持
- 整理维护英文知识库，海外工单响应时间缩短50%

---

### 杭州海康威视数字技术股份有限公司
**技术支持** | 新西兰奥克兰 | 2018.05 - 2020.12

关键词：安防相机、视频管理、POE

- 负责海康全线产品技术支持，解决效率长期保持大洋洲Team前3
- 2019全年经手项目超过2M USD

---

### 深圳市大疆创新科技有限公司
**FAE（飞控数据分析主管）** | 广东深圳 | 2015.01 - 2018.05

关键词：飞控、炸机、定责、团队管理

- 带领17人团队，负责全球飞控数据分析
- 协助法务部出具飞行器事故鉴定报告，多次被法官采纳并胜诉

---

## 教育经历

### 深圳大学
**市场营销** | 2011.09 - 2015.07

---

## 个人技能

- 软件技能：Linux/Shell/Postman/Docker/CANoe/MySQL
- 专业技能：IoT设备调试/ADAS系统调试/Linux系统部署/API接口测试
- 管理能力：团队建设与管理/跨部门协作/KPI体系设计

---

## 语言水平及证书

- 英语（C1，技术文档编写）
- 德语（A1基础会话）
- CET6（590+）/ 剑桥商务英语（中级）

Post.title: Work Experience
Post._content:
## Work Experience

### Kunshan Qtech Smart Vision Co., Ltd.
**Project Manager** | Kunshan/Shenzhen | Feb. 2025 - Present

- Acted as Project Manager, responsible for forming a cross-functional project team
- Served as the primary point of contact for Meta, leading the company's first large-scale overseas mass production project
- Managed the trial production of camera modules for Google's next-generation XR device

---

### Shenzhen ZYT Technology Co., Ltd. (DJI Automotive)
**FAE Head (T4)** | Shenzhen, Guangdong | May 2022 - Feb. 2025

Keywords: ADAS, CANoe, QNX, System Engineer

- As the head of DJI Automotive R&D FAE, led a team of over 40 people
- Deeply involved in multiple SOP projects, interfacing with OEMs such as Wuling, Volkswagen, BYD, and Chery

---

### SenseTime Technology Co., Ltd. (SCG)
**Technical Support** | Shenzhen, Guangdong | Dec. 2020 - May 2022

Keywords: Facial recognition, docker, Restful API

- Responsible for providing technical support to overseas customers
- Organized English Knowledge Base, overseas ticket response time reduced by 50%

---

### Hikvision New Zealand
**Technical Support** | Auckland, New Zealand | May 2018 - Dec. 2020

Keywords: Video surveillance, NVR, POE

- Provided technical support for all Hikvision products
- Handled projects exceeding 2M USD in 2019

---

### DJI Innovation Technology Co., Ltd.
**FAE (Flight Control Data Analysis Supervisor)** | Shenzhen, Guangdong | Jan. 2015 - May 2018

Keywords: Flight controller, Crash, Team management

- Led a 17-person team, responsible for global flight control Data Analysis
- Assisted Legal Department in issuing aircraft accident appraisal reports

---

## Education

### Shenzhen University
**Marketing** | Sep. 2011 - Jul. 2015

---

## Personal Skills

- Software: Linux/Shell/Postman/Docker/CANoe/MySQL
- Professional: IoT Device Debugging / ADAS System Debugging / Linux System Deployment
- Management: Team Building / Cross-functional Collaboration / KPI System Design

---

## Language Proficiency

- English (C1, technical document writing)
- German (A1 basic conversation)
- CET6 (590+) / Cambridge Business English (Vantage)
